pages.title: Home
pages.description: The main timeline page showing tweets from users the logged-in user is following

components.name: Navbar
components.description: Navigation bar with links to other pages

components.name: TweetFeed
components.description: Displays a feed of tweets from followed users

pages.title: Login
pages.description: The login page for users to sign in to their account

components.name: Navbar
components.description: Navigation bar with links to other pages

components.name: LoginForm
components.description: Form for users to enter their credentials and log in

pages.title: Register
pages.description: The registration page for new users to create an account

components.name: Navbar
components.description: Navigation bar with links to other pages

components.name: RegistrationForm
components.description: Form for new users to create an account

pages.title: UserProfile
pages.description: A user's profile page showing their bio, tweets, followers, and users they are following

components.name: Navbar
components.description: Navigation bar with links to other pages

components.name: UserProfileHeader
components.description: Displays the user's profile picture, name, bio, and stats

components.name: TweetFeed
components.description: Displays a feed of the user's tweets

components.name: FollowingList
components.description: List of users the profile user is following

components.name: FollowersList
components.description: List of users following the profile user

pages.title: ComposeTweet
pages.description: A page for the logged-in user to compose and post a new tweet

components.name: Navbar
components.description: Navigation bar with links to other pages

components.name: TweetComposer
components.description: Form for the user to enter and post a new tweet
